about_the_game:
Gym Manager Demo is a free demo version of a game where you get to manage, build, and expand your own gym. After being fired by the gym owner, you decided to get revenge and spend all your savings on opening a new gym, with the goal of making your former boss bankrupt. The demo version is limited to one hour of gameplay time and fewer game mechanics.



As the main mechanic of the game, you will have to manage, build, and expand your gym. You can buy new equipment, upgrade existing ones and sell supplements. You can also expand your gym by demolishing walls, buying new decorations. Meanwhile, you must protect your gym from potential danger, keep the gym clean and manage your members.



Outside of managing your gym, you can engage in various activities in town, including flirting with girls, sabotaging the competition gym, partying, doing illegal business with a shady guy in the backstreet and lockpicking and stealing from the town while avoiding the police.

name: Gym Manager Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 2GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Probably needed...

short_description: Gym Manager Demo is a free simulation game where you can build, expand and manage your own Gym. To attract more clients - invest in new equipment, keep the room clean and sabotage your competitors.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
